Build: 20020425

This is Suyog Mody in boot camp, reporting in Tod's name

I got an internal error with a dialog box saying
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)

The following steps led to it-
1. Working in the Navigator view , right clicked on the 
com.oti.bc.tgb.helloworld connected 
to :extssh:smody@cvslnxtest.ott.oti.com:/home/cvs/repo
2. selected Team->Synchronize with repository in the Navigator view
3. brought up the Synchronizing- Incoming Mode view 
4. On selecting the class and copying from the the repository changes to the 
local file, it brought up a dialog that said "Are you sure you want update?"
5. Clicked yes and the internal error occured with the message - 
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)

Unable to reproduce the error.

Need more information.

(a) Step 4. What does 'Copying from the repository changes to the local file'
mean? Did you use the arrow buttons in the lower toolbar, or did you use the
update action? Did you right-click in the editor and select save?

(b) There is no dialog that says "Are you sure you want update?", or anything
close. What did the dialog actually say?

Tony

Please see James's request for info at the bottom of this PR.
Wasn't me. It was Suyog Mody.
Suyog please help out James with more info
Can't do anything without more information.
